channel.title: Releasing my client
channel.description: Alright, I want to know how I should go about doing this. I see some clients that people release to the members of their community, and all they have is a .run file and stuff like that. I'm wanting to know how to get it like that.

item.title: Releasing my client
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Delete the java files.

Read full topic

item.title: Releasing my client
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

iZombz:

Alright, I want to know how I should go about doing this. I see some clients that people release to the members of their community, and all they have is a .run file and stuff like that. I’m wanting to know how to get it like that.

Most people just downloading a random client, Change name and that shit. Maybe add some models…

All client have run.bat and that shit, or it wont work.

Read full topic
